definition: cause to be held in suspension in a fluid
details:
verb
- cause to be held in suspension in a fluid
= example: cause to be held in suspension in a fluid
- stop a process or a habit by imposing a freeze on it
= synonyms: freeze
- make inoperative or stop
= example: make inoperative or stop
= synonyms: set aside
- hang freely
= example: hang freely
= synonyms: drop
- bar temporarily
= synonyms: debar
- render temporarily ineffective
= example: render temporarily ineffective
